mil3.4.3:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.4.3:0.3_0: The allowance for those who are perfect in common.
mil3.4.3:1.2_0: “Are you able to do all the same thing in the vehicle, or the five hundred of deeds? Or is one person’s action?”
mil3.4.3:1.3_0: “Contact, great king, harness the single kind of work.”
mil3.4.3:2.2_0: “What do you think, great king? Would one of these different fields could make the fruits of different colors?”
mil3.4.3:2.4_0: “In the same way, there are five kinds of people that depend on one or other, and doesn’t experience through one deeds.”
mil3.4.3:4.1_0: The third section for recitation on the sense fields is finished.
